summary: Adds Kratos\'s face tattoo to the warpaint selection.
descriptionHtml:
This replaces warpaint # 10. if you want it to replace another warpaint pattern, just change the \"10\" to the corresponding pattern\'s number. (Count from left to right in the Character Creation screen)

You can make it any color you want. Not just red. ;)

Honestly, I\'m not that big of a God of War fan. But I\'m sure a lot of you are, so this ones for you guys! :)

This took the better part of 2, maybe 3 minuets? So don\'t expect perfection! 
Hope you enjoy! :D
author: Kyim
